about.description:
Bokeh is a Python interactive visualization library that targets
modern web browsers for presentation. Its goal is to provide elegant,
concise  construction of novel graphics in the style of D3.js, and to
extend this capability with high-performance interactivity over very
large or streaming datasets. Bokeh can help anyone who would like to
quickly and easily create interactive plots, dashboards, and data
applications.
about.summary: Statistical and novel interactive HTML plots for Python

about.description:
Bokeh is a Python interactive visualization library that targets
modern web browsers for presentation. Its goal is to provide elegant,
concise  construction of novel graphics in the style of D3.js, and to
extend this capability with high-performance interactivity over very
large or streaming datasets. Bokeh can help anyone who would like to
quickly and easily create interactive plots, dashboards, and data
applications.
about.summary: Statistical and novel interactive HTML plots for Python

name: bokeh
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "3.3.2" %}

package:
  name: bokeh
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/b/bokeh/bokeh-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: ae180f86f776525f7eb81673a1f27e0eb56887d733771662c512ec0d82a433f5
  patches:
    - do_not_check_tags.patch

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script:
    - {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  entry_points:
    - bokeh = bokeh.__main__:main

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.9
    - pip
    - setuptools-git-versioning
    - setuptools >=64
    - colorama
  run:
    - python >=3.9
    - jinja2 >=2.9
    - contourpy >=1
    - numpy >=1.16
    - packaging >=16.8
    - pandas >=1.2
    - pillow >=7.1.0
    - pyyaml >=3.10
    - tornado >=5.1
    - xyzservices >=2021.09.1

test:
  imports:
    - bokeh
    - bokeh.application
    - bokeh.application.handlers
    - bokeh.client
    - bokeh.command
    - bokeh.command.subcommands
    - bokeh.core
    - bokeh.core.property
    - bokeh.core.validation
    - bokeh.models
    - bokeh.models.widgets
    - bokeh.plotting
    - bokeh.sampledata
    - bokeh.server
    - bokeh.protocol
    - bokeh.protocol.messages
    - bokeh.server.views
    - bokeh.sphinxext
    - bokeh.themes
    - bokeh.util
  commands:
    - pip check
    - bokeh --help
  requires:
    - pip

about:
  home: https://bokeh.org
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  license_family: BSD
  summary: Statistical and novel interactive HTML plots for Python
  description: |
    Bokeh is a Python interactive visualization library that targets
    modern web browsers for presentation. Its goal is to provide elegant,
    concise  construction of novel graphics in the style of D3.js, and to
    extend this capability with high-performance interactivity over very
    large or streaming datasets. Bokeh can help anyone who would like to
    quickly and easily create interactive plots, dashboards, and data
    applications.
  doc_url: https://docs.bokeh.org
  dev_url: https://github.com/bokeh/bokeh

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - almarklein
    - jakirkham
    - mattpap
    - ocefpaf
    - philippjfr
